name: Despina Olympiou
description: '''Despina Olympiou''' ([[Greek language|Greek]]: Δέσποινα Ολυμπίου, {{IPA|el|ˈðespina oliˈmbi.u|pron}}; born 17 October 1975), also known as '''Dena Olympiou''', is a Cypriot singer, famous in her homeland as well as in Greece. She [[Cyprus in the Eurovision Song Contest 2013|represented Cyprus]] in the [[Eurovision Song Contest 2013]] in [[Malmö]], Sweden.
